name: Timelapse Flight | Amsterdam to London | KLM Fokker 70
description:
A timelapse flight from Amsterdam to London Heathrow, onboard KLM Fokker 70 PH-WXD operating flight KL1027 on 30 January 2016.

Full flight in real time: https://youtu.be/wbRTRh2ShFI

Our flight begins onstand at the KLM Cityhopper ramp at Amsterdam's Schiphol airport.  We receive our departure clearance before getting clearance to start, and taxi out to runway 24 (Kaagbaan) at Schiphol.  We blast off into a beautiful sunset, rocketing out of Schiphol towards FL240.

As we cross the North Sea we hand over to London ATC, and commence our approach over London as the sun starts to set.  We line up for a landing on runway 27L, and touchdown ahead of schedule before taxying into Heathrow's Terminal 4.  

Airline:  KLM Cityhopper
Flight:  KL1023
Aircraft:  Fokker 70 PH-KZE
From:  Amsterdam Schiphol (AMS)
To:  London Heathrow (LHR)
Departure:  16:59
Arrival:  16:55
Flight Time:  00:56
Seat:  15A
Flight Path: http://goo.gl/ipCIgD

Filmed from seat 15A.
